name: Broiled Grapefruit
author: LAURA_G123
summary: Sweeten up your morning with this nifty way to prepare grapefruit! This is the only way my mother could convince me to eat my grapefruit, and I still eat it this way.
directions: Cut the grapefruits in half, and use a small serrated knife to cut out the sections in the halves
Spoon the sections and juice into a bowl, then scrape out all of the remaining thick skins and pulp
Spoon the sections from the bowl back into the halves
This is best done one half at a time
Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon over the top of each grapefruit half, adjusting as you see fit
Place the halves on a cookie sheet
Broil for 3 to 5 minutes, until the butter is melted and sugar is starting to turn brown
